TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAttributeStatement extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement

Docs.summary: Contains a set of attributes associated with a particular .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement> 類別會對應到已在 OASIS SAML 1.1 規格中定義之 `<saml:AttributeStatement>` XML 項目。
SamlSecurityToken 安全性權杖的宣告會包含在 SAML 陳述式中，而此陳述式接著會包含在 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> 內。 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement> 就是一種這類的陳述式，它會將一組任意宣告繫結到特定的 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject>。 這些宣告會以 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute> 集合的方式表示，並且儲存在 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.Attributes%2A> 屬性中。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject samlSubject, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute> attributes) cil managed

Docs.param: A that specifies the subject of the claim.
An of type that contains a set of attributes associated with the subject.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified subject and set of attributes associated with the subject.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表指定由這個建構函式之參數所設定的屬性。
|屬性|參數| |--------------|---------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.Attributes%2A>|`Attributes`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject%2A>|`samlSubject`|

Docs.exception: contains a member that is . -or- contains zero members.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddClaimsToList(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> claims) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub AddClaimsToList (claims As IList(Of Claim))

Docs.param: An of type that contains the set of claims to add to the SAML statement.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified set of claims as attributes to this SAML statement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.AddClaimsToList%28System.Collections.Generic.IList%7BSystem.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim%7D%29> 方法，即可將宣告集合轉換成 SAML 判斷提示的屬性。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Attributes As IList(Of SamlAttribute)

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of attributes associated with the subject of the SAML assertion.
Docs.value: 型別為 的 ，其中包含與主體關聯的屬性集合。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 每個 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute> 可以包含多個屬性值。
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.Attributes%2A> 集合中的每個成員會對應到 `<saml:Attribute>` 項目，而該項目已定義在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML 規格中。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
Docs.value: 如果這個執行個體的屬性是唯讀的，則為 ，否則為 。 預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement> 類別的這個執行個體變成唯讀的，此時會呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MakeReadOnly() cil managed

Docs.summary: Causes this instance to be read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法時，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> 屬性會設定為 `true`，而且將無法再設定這個執行個體的屬性。

Docs.param: An to read the SAML attribute statement.
A that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML attribute statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
A that determines the security token that created the digital signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.ReadXml%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> 方法會設定 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement.Attributes%2A> 以及 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject%2A> 屬性。

Docs.exception: refers to an XML element that does not contain a element -or- refers to an XML element that contains a element that does not have an attribute value.
